description: After a couple of years hiatus, Chase is back to fuck around with Porter! “I’ve missed you guys, plain and simple!” We were curious about what he’s been up to. “I’ve just been hanging out, working out, trying to get lean for the summer.” You can definitely tell he’s been working on that body of his. Porter as well! So we had to take a look at their abs before they got down to business. They both look great! Chase really gave it his all, I guess being away for a few years got him all hyped up to pound ass. Porter took the hard pounding well, of course.
title: Chase & Porter: Bareback
